name: SABRE (itch)
description:
SABRE is a fast-paced sword swinging game where the enemies get faster and your health get lower the better you do.
This game was made for #CGAjam.
Instructions:
WASD: Move
 LMB: Swing your sword
RMB: Dash towards your cursor (max distance indicated by ring around player
 R: Start/restart the game upon death
This game is super rushed and not at all as good as it could have been, sorry.
The jam ended during my graduation week. :(
